type.name: AlgorithmIdentifier
type.description: Identifies a cryptographic algorithm and its associated parameters. This type is used to specify signature algorithms in log messages.

field.name: algorithm
field.description: Identifies the signature algorithm used by the Secure Element. The value MUST be configured according to BSI TR-03116.

field.name: parameters
field.description: Contains the associated parameters of the signature algorithm employed. The structure and value depend on the particular algorithm employed.

type.usage: Used in log messages to identify the signature algorithm and its parameters.

references.reference: BSI TR-03116 for approved signature algorithms
